title: Attempting to reconnect
body: Everytime i log in, i cant open a lobby, cant see my mastery score and the icons of my friends and after like 30 seconds it says "Attempting to reconnect" wich doesnt happen. Its all the time since yesterday. Help pls.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some weak network issues that's losing sync or disconnecting entirely from pvp.net.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, which will help tighten up your  connection and make sure your settings are configured accurately.  Let me know if you have any questions.
